1011000010011000 1100011010001000 1 -> sum: 0111011100100001, cout: 1
1111011000100001 1010101101100010 0 -> sum: 1010000110000011, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
